body:
Comment 15 by **setspace**: 
hmm.  problems from clean build of osx lion.

i tried

    http://golang.org/doc/install.html#ctools

on a cleanly built osx/lion from scratch with xcode and save the error

     6g   -p net/http/cgi -o _gotest_.6 child.go host.go  child_test.go host_test.go 

immediately reran ./all.bash ... with no errors. 

my first guess would be a timing dependent error in the test in child_test.go
host_test.go.  
ho hum.  life is short ... go must be stable cause ken is an author.

-j
